channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Xwing completes first autonomous gate-to-gate commercial cargo flight
item.description: Autonomous aviation startup Xwing has completed the first gate-to-gate commercial cargo flight using a Cessna Grand Caravan 208B utility aircraft retrofitted with its AutoFlight system.

item.title: Mercedes EQS first look: The pinnacle of EV luxury
item.description: The EQS is an EV take on the Mercedes-Benz S Class, the company's classic luxury model. While we wait for US pricing, Mercedes gave us an opportunity to check out the vehicle and test some of its features.

item.title: Microsoft Edge Kids Mode rolls out in the US
item.description: We learned in February that Microsoft was testing a Kids Mode for its Edge browser — as of today, it's now available for English users in the US.

item.title: Save time and energy with the MowRo robot lawn mower
item.description: This robotic lawnmower will cut your lawn, charge itself when it's down and follow your schedule regardless of your motivation or energy.

item.title: Apple starts $200 million fund to remove CO2 by restoring forests
item.description: Apple has launched a $200 million Restore Fund to capture CO2 by reviving forests.

item.title: ‘Days Gone’ hits Steam and Epic Games Store on May 19th
item.description: Sony's survival horror game will have 21:9 ultra-wide monitor support on PC.

item.title: US expels Russian diplomats in response to SolarWinds hack
item.description: The US has expelled Russian diplomats and imposed new sanctions in response to the SolarWinds hack and election interference.

item.title: DJI unveils the Air 2S drone with 20-megapixel camera
item.description: The Mavic Air 2's replacement offers more megapixels and a larger sensor for superior photo credentials.

item.title: Google Earth's biggest update in years adds free 3D timelapse videos
item.description: Google Earth is getting its biggest update to the service since 2017. It's adding 3D timelapse videos that anyone can watch and download for free.

item.title: Adidas' Stan Smith Mylo are its first mushroom leather sneakers
item.description: Adidas wants to launch a mushroom leather shoe in 12 months.

item.title: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile unlimited 5G plans start at $30 per month
item.description: Comcast has unveiled new unlimited Xfinity Mobile 5G plans promising "the lowest ever prices for unlimited data for new and existing customers."

item.title: Samsung's Galaxy Buds Pro hit all-time low of $165 at Woot
item.description: Samsung's Galaxy Buds Pro earbuds are on sale at an all-time low, while the Galaxy Buds+ have also been reduced.

item.title: Lyft lets you request rides directly from your healthcare provider
item.description: Lyft is introducing a healthcare pass that lets health plan provides and social services organizations cover rides for eligible patients.

item.title: The Morning After: TCL's Fold n' Roll phone transforms between three sizes
item.description: TCL has a funky concept phone to show off and LG is ready to sell its ultra-expensive rollable TV.

item.title: Apple’s AirPods Pro fall to $197 at Amazon
item.description: You can get a pair of Apple's AirPods Pro for $197 right now from Amazon, where it's on sale for $52 lower than its original price.

item.title: Facebook reaches its target of using 100 percent renewable energy
item.description: Facebook says it has reached its goal to power its global operations on renewable energy several months ahead of its targets thanks to a large investment in solar and wind energy projects.

item.title: Twitch is purging 7.5 million bots that inflated view and follower counts
item.description: Twitch has discovered over 7.5 million bot accounts that have been inflating streamer stats.

item.title: Ubisoft delays Assassin's Creed Valhalla's first major expansion to May 13th
item.description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla's first major expansion, Wrath of the Druids, will come out a couple of weeks later than expected.

item.title: Bang & Olufsen's latest speaker was designed to look like a book
item.description: With a design inspired by a book, Bang & Olufsen's Beosound Emerge is an impressively slim and full-featured speaker.

item.title: Sony's PS5 update added 120Hz for 1080p displays and better HDMI control
item.description: The first big PlayStation 5 update adds new features to almost every part of the system.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra gets eSIM support for T-Mobile in the US
item.description: T-Mobile has rolled out an update for the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra that adds eSIM support to the phone, allowing you to use your number without having to slot in a physical SIM.

item.title: Google rolls out Chrome 90, which defaults to HTTPS instead of HTTP
item.description: Starting with Chrome 90, Google will automatically try to create an encrypted connection with any websites you visit.

item.title: Microsoft: Timeline is staying in Windows 10, but without free syncing
item.description: Timeline was the "star" of Microsoft's big 2018 update for Windows 10 and while it will still remember everything you did, it just won't save that information to the cloud anymore.

item.title: LG's rollable OLED R TV is available in the US, if you can afford one
item.description: LG's rollable OLED TV is available, it's just probably not affordable.

item.title: Twitch is failing trans streamers, so Peer2Peer is stepping up
item.description: Identity-based tags allow marginalized streamers to build safer communities.
